properties.name: _Louisiana Purchase
properties.note:
Louisiana Purchase (1803-04-30)

1803/04/30 -> 1804/09/30

The United States purchased Louisiana from France, taking formal possession 20 December 1803; boundaries were not clearly defined but unquestionably included the western half of the Mississippi drainage basin.

(Cox, facing 2, 80-100; Parry, 57:27-40; Van Zandt, 23-26)
